content.question: All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: The curve begins at point (0 comma 6). The curve trends up gradually through (1.4 comma 9) to reach its maximum point at (2.5 comma 10). At point (2.5 comma 10), the curve trends down gradually through (3.6 comma 9, through (5 comma 6), and through (5.4 comma 5), to reach its minimum point at (7.5 comma 2). At point (7.5 comma 2), the curve trends up gradually to the right through (9.6 comma 5) and ends at a point (10 comma 6). ​The graph of the sinusoidal function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. Of the following, which is greatest?

choices.label: ​​The length of the interval that satisfies <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses less or equal than 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≤</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​The sum of the lengths of the intervals that satisfy <math alttext="5 less or equal than f open parentheses x close parentheses less or equal than 6"><semantics><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≤</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​The length of the interval that satisfies <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 9"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​The length of the interval that satisfies <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 10"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​​The length of the interval that satisfies <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses less or equal than 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≤</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
